Client

Class ChatClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • Client.ChatClient

  • public class ChatClient
extends java.lang.Object
    It's main class for connetion with gui and server. After running user must write correct server adress, and next pick unique name, after that user can communicate with other users
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Aleksander

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) GUI gui
      gui application - this class make all visible part
      (package private) java.io.BufferedReader in
      Input character streams for the socket.
      (package private) java.lang.String name
      Special neme for user.
      (package private) java.io.PrintWriter out
      Output character streams for the socket.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ChatClient()
      Constructs the client by laying out the GUI and registering a listener with the textfield so that pressing Return in the listener sends the textfield contents to the server.

    • Method Detail

      • connectsToTheServer

        private java.net.Socket connectsToTheServer()
                                     throws java.io.IOException
        Connects to the server. If adress of server will be unkonow, or network will be unreachable then communique will be sand to the client
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • initializeUserName

        private void initializeUserName()
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Initialize user name. Proposed user name will be sent to the server in order to confirm. After confirm textField will be actived
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • ProcessMessagesFromServer

        private void ProcessMessagesFromServer()
                                throws java.io.IOException
        Process messages from server. Take message from server and shows on messageArea
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
